title: How to Get Sponsored for Open Source in Bangalore with Blockchain-based Licenses
description: Learn how to secure sponsorships for your open source projects using blockchain-based mechanisms like the Open Compensation Token License. Build a strong presence, attract sponsors, and make your contributions financially sustainable.
keywords: blockchain sponsorship, open source funding, Open Compensation Token License, blockchain-powered open source, blockchain-based open source license, open source grants, sponsorship for developers, fund open source projects
